title: Jayasuriya denied central contract
content: Colombo: Veteran all-rounder Sanath Jayasuriya has been denied central contract by Sri Lanka Cricket (SLC) while retiring spin wizard Muttiah Muralitharan finds his name in the 20-player list issued for the current year by SLC. Jayasuriya, a veteran of 110 Tests and 444 ODIs, has been witnessing a slump in his performance for quite some…
